name: Red Cabbage Glazed With Maple Syrup
keywords: bacon, maple syrup, red cabbage, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, fall, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1 medium firm, tart apple, peeled, cored and sliced
1 pound red cabbage (about 1/2 head), cored, outer leaves removed and remainder shredded
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In an oven-proof saucepan or a flame-proof casserole large enough to hold all the ingredients, saute the bacon until crisp. Add the onion and saute until translucent. Add the remaining ingredients, cover and bake in the oven for 1/2 hour.
